channel.title: FAQ on Rhombus Project Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in FAQ on Rhombus Project Wiki

item.title: FAQ: RHOM coin
item.description: What is RHOM? Can I store RHOM on a hardware wallet? Where can I buy RHOM coins? Will RHOM be added to other exchanges? What is RHOM’s codebase? What are the transactions fees for RHOM? What are RHOM’s transactions sizes? What is RHOM’s inflation rate? Why has RHOM different privacy states? Are whitepapers available for the CT and RingCT privacy protocols? Is Segwit enabled?

item.title: FAQ: Rhombus Open Marketplace
item.description: Are there fees for using the marketplace? Who collects the fees? Do I need to keep my computer online for my listings to stay up? How long do listings stay up? Can I use any other coin other than RHOM? Are regular (fiat) currencies and traditional means of payment accepted? How much privacy does the marketplace offer? Is the marketplace moderated? How does the escrow system functions?
